title: Loss for not connecting to the server 5 minutes before the game ended
body:
Dear Riot,
I don't feel that it's fair that I take a loss in LP for your server acting funny. I was able to surf the web during this reconnect, so my internet wasn't the issue. 
I was carrying my team and got us all of the objectives if you watch the replay. Please, fix your servers and give me my LP gains....

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot modify or return LP under any condition. The system was designed this way to prevent abuse of the system.

I wasn't able to find a record of server issues, so I recommend going through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are compatible with Leauge. If you continue to have issues, we can investigate your route to the server. Let me know the results of those steps!
